list.sql: SELECT :select FROM integration.participant WHERE (disable = false or disable is null) and :filters ORDER BY :sorting LIMIT :limit OFFSET :offset

count.sql: SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM integration.participant WHERE (disable = false or disable is null) AND :filters

filters.eq: ((select id from integration.participant_permission pp where pp.participant_code = code and pp.participant_method_id = :participant_method_id) is null and (select participant_code from integration.participant_method where id = :participant_method_id) != code)
